data.title: National Register of Historic Places
data.meta_description: Our historic hotels and resorts offer unique accommodations that capture the essence, elegance, and style of timeless American history and culture. Book today!
data.text:
Historic Hotels of America member hotels listed in The National Register of Historic Places, hotels located in a Historic District which is listed in the National Register of Historic Places and hotels designated by the U.S. Secretary of the Interior as a National Historic Landmark.

1. National Register of Historic Places: Hotels listed in The National Register of Historic Places
